info.description: Public information regarding the Patent Trial and Appeal Board's (PTAB) America Invents Act (AIA) Trials, Appeals & Inteferences and associated documents.
info.title: PTAB Proceedings and Documents REST API

get.summary: Provides Decision Outcomes information on AIA Trials, Appeals and Intereferences based on filter inputs
get.description: Return Outcome Records for given search input. No required parameter. By default all outcome metadata would return. Filters are optional parameters that can be used to reduce the number of result.

parameters.name: applicationNumberText
parameters.description: Filters by the Application Number

parameters.name: decisionDate
parameters.description: Filters by the decisionDate of document in yyyy-mm-dd format

parameters.name: decisionFromDate
parameters.description: Filters by the decisionDate of document on and after (in yyyy-mm-dd format). If this date is given then lastModifiedDateTo is mandatory to provide to get the results

parameters.name: decisionToDate
parameters.description: Filters by the decisionDate of document on and before (in yyyy-mm-dd format)

parameters.name: decisionTypeCategory
parameters.description: Filters by the decision Type

parameters.name: documentIdentifier
parameters.description: Filters by the Document Id

parameters.name: documentName
parameters.description: Filters by the Document Name

parameters.name: grantDate
parameters.description: Filters by the grantDate of document in yyyy-mm-dd format

parameters.name: grantFromDate
parameters.description: Filters by the grantDate of document on and after (in yyyy-mm-dd format). If this date is given then lastModifiedDateTo is mandatory to provide to get the results

parameters.name: grantToDate
parameters.description: Filters by the grantDate of document on and before (in yyyy-mm-dd format)

parameters.name: partyName
parameters.description: Filters by the Petitioner Party Name

parameters.name: patentNumber
parameters.description: Filters by the Patent Number

parameters.name: patentOwnerName
parameters.description: Filters by the Patent Owner Name

parameters.name: proceedingNumber
parameters.description: Filters by the Proceeding Number

parameters.name: proceedingTypeCategory
parameters.description: Filters by the Proceeding Type

parameters.name: recordStartNumber
parameters.description: Filters the documents from the start point e.g 0 / 4 / 6

parameters.name: recordTotalQuantity
parameters.description: Filters according to the size of the document like 10,20

parameters.name: searchText
parameters.description: Filters by Search Text

parameters.name: sortOrderCategory
parameters.description: Dictates how the result set is to be sorted. The value of the parameter may be any property name of the Document model. The parameter value may be prefixed with a - to sort descendingly or with a + to sort ascendingly. Ascendingly is the default direction if no prefix is specified.Multiple sort parameters are applied in the order specified within the query string. For example, sort=documentNumber&sort=-filingDate means "first sort by document number asecndingly, then by filing date, from most recent to least recent."

parameters.name: subdecisionTypeCategory
parameters.description: Filters by the sub decision Type

parameters.name: subproceedingTypeCategory
parameters.description: Filters by the sub Proceeding Type

parameters.name: technologyCenterNumber
parameters.description: Filters by the Tech center Number

post.summary: Provides Decision Outcomes information on AIA Trials, Appeals and Intereferences
post.description: Return Outcome Records for given search input. Here are some examples of input format: E.g. 1. { "facetMap": {"filingParty": ["board"]}, "paramMap": {}, "rows": 0, "sortByColumn": "string", "sortOrder": "string", "start": 0 } E.g. 2. { "facetMap": {"filingParty": ["board", "petitioner"], "type": ["notice"]}, "paramMap": {"documentNumber":"73", "title":"power of attorney"}, "rows": 20, "sortByColumn": "type", "sortOrder": "desc", "start": 0 } E.g. 3. {} Please DO NOT copy/paste, rather type in. For more filter values, refer to the response of above GET (/documents) end point for the documents

parameters.name: searchInput
parameters.description: Searches Decision Outcomes.

401.description: Requestor must authenticate in order to access resource

404.description: Resouce not found or query did not return any data

get.description: Returns PTAB Public Documents for given search input. No required parameters. Parameters may be provided to filter the result set. Repeated filter query parameters will be logical "OR" rather than logical "AND" Invalid query parameter values will be ignored.

parameters.name: applicationNumberText
parameters.description: Filters by the application Number

parameters.name: documentFilingDate
parameters.description: Filters by the date (YYYY-MM-DD) a document was filed.

parameters.name: documentFilingFromDate
parameters.description: Filters by documents filed on or before the given date (YYYY-MM-DD). If this date is given then documentFilingDateTo is mandatory to provide to get the results

parameters.name: documentFilingToDate
parameters.description: Filters by documents filed on or after the given date (YYYY-MM-DD).

parameters.name: documentIdentifier
parameters.description: Filters by the Document Id

parameters.name: documentName
parameters.description: Filters by the Document Name

parameters.name: documentNumber
parameters.description: Filters by the document Number

parameters.name: documentTitleText
parameters.description: Filters by Document title

parameters.name: documentTypeName
parameters.description: Filters by the document Type such as notice, Mandatory Notice, motion, opposition, power of attorney, rehearing request, order, Judge Working File, Petion, etc.

parameters.name: filingPartyCategory
parameters.description: Filters by the party who filed the document. Values are petitioner, patent_owner, board, or potential_patent_owner

parameters.name: partyName
parameters.description: Filters by the Petitioner Party Name

parameters.name: patentOwnerName
parameters.description: Filters by the patent Owner Name

parameters.name: proceedingNumber
parameters.description: Filters by the proceeding NUmber

parameters.name: proceedingTypeCategory
parameters.description: Filters by the proceeding Type

parameters.name: recordStartNumber
parameters.description: Filters the documents from the start point e.g 0 / 4 / 6

parameters.name: recordTotalQuantity
parameters.description: Filters according to the size of the document like 10,20

parameters.name: sortOrderCategory
parameters.description: Dictates how the result set is to be sorted. The value of the parameter may be any property name of the Document model. The parameter value may be prefixed with a - to sort descendingly or with a + to sort ascendingly. Ascendingly is the default direction if no prefix is specified.Multiple sort parameters are applied in the order specified within the query string. For example, sort=documentNumber&sort=-filingDate means "first sort by document number asecndingly, then by filing date, from most recent to least recent."

get.summary: Download all documents of certain proceeding number in one zip file
get.description: Download all documents in one zip file for a given proceeding number

parameters.name: proceedingNumber
parameters.description: Proceeding Number

401.description: Requestor must authenticate in order to access resource

404.description: Resouce not found or query did not return any data

parameters.name: searchInput
parameters.description: Searches Documents.

401.description: Requestor must authenticate in order to access resource

404.description: Resouce not found or query did not return any data

get.summary: Download a single document of certain document id
get.description: Download a single document for a given document id

parameters.name: documentIdentifier
parameters.description: document Id

401.description: Requestor must authenticate in order to access resource

404.description: Resouce not found or query did not return any data

get.summary: Return aggregations for Public PTAB Proceedings
get.description: Return aggregations for Public PTAB Proceedings

parameters.name: proceedingFilingFromDate
parameters.description: Filters by the proceedingFilingFromDate of document on and after (in yyyy-mm format). If this date is given then lastModifiedDateTo is mandatory to provide to get the results

parameters.name: proceedingFilingToDate
parameters.description: Filters by the proceedingFilingToDate of document on and before (in yyyy-mm format)

401.description: Requestor must authenticate in order to access resource

404.description: Resouce not found or query did not return any data

parameters.description: Dictates how the result set is to be sorted. The value of the parameter may be any property name of the Document model. The parameter value may be prefixed with a - to sort descendingly or with a + to sort ascendingly. Ascendingly is the default direction if no prefix is specified.Multiple sort parameters are applied in the order specified within the query string. post.description: Return PTAB Proceedings Information for given search input. Here are some examples of input format: E.g. 1. { "facetMap": {"prosecutionStatus": ["FWD Entered"]}, "paramMap": {}, "rows": 0, "sortByColumn": "string", "sortOrder": "string", "start": 0 } E.g. 2. { "facetMap": {"petitionerName": ["Liberty Mutual Insurance Company", "SAP America, Inc."]}, "paramMap": {"proceedingNumber":"CBM2012-00001", "patentNumber":"6553350"}, "rows": 20, "sortByColumn": "patentNumber", "sortOrder": "desc", "start": 0 } E.g. 3. {} Please DO NOT copy/paste, rather type in. For more filter values, refer to the response of above GET (/trials) end point for the trials

parameters.name: searchInput
parameters.description: Searches Public Ptab Proceedings.

401.description: Requestor must authenticate in order to access resource
